panels.description: The time between when a user clicks on a channel in the LHS and when posts in that channel are shown to them, measured as a percentile of all requests in a given 30 minute period
panels.title: Channel Switch

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all Channel Switch measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 250ms
- Needs Improvement: 500ms
panels.title: Channel Switch (Overall)

panels.description: The time between when a user clicks on a team in the LHS and when posts in a channel on that team are shown to them
panels.title: Team Switch

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all Team Switch measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 750ms
- Needs Improvement: 1.25s
panels.title: Team Switch (Overall)

panels.description: The time between when a user clicks to open the RHS and when the VirtualizedThreadViewer component is mounted, measured as a percentile of all requests in a given 30 minute period
panels.title: RHS Load

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all RHS Load measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 350ms
- Needs Improvement: 600ms
panels.title: RHS Load (Overall)

panels.description: The time between when a user clicks on Threads in the LHS and when a list of threads is rendered, measured as a percentile of all requests in a given 30 minute period
panels.title: Threads List Load

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all Threads List Load measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 500ms
- Needs Improvement: 800ms
panels.title: Threads List Load (Overall)

panels.description: Tracks the duration of the longest click or keyboard interaction during an application's lifecycle (Desktop/Chrome/Edge only)
panels.title: Interaction to Next Paint (INP)

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all Interaction to Next Paint measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 200ms
- Needs Improvement: 500ms
panels.title: INP (Overall)

panels.description: The number of times that the main UI thread of a browser was blocked for more than 50ms (Desktop/Chrome/Edge only)
panels.title: Long Tasks

panels.description: Tracks the time from when a browser first requests data from the server until when the browser starts to receive a response
panels.title: Time to First Byte (TTFB)

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all Time To First Byte measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 800ms
- Needs Improvement: 1.8s
panels.title: TTFB (Overall)

panels.description: The time between when the browser starts to load the web app and when the `window.load` event completes which is before much of the web app is loaded.
panels.title: Load Event End (Formerly Page Load)

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all Load Event End measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 2.25s
- Needs Improvement: 4.5s
panels.title: Load Event End (Overall)

panels.description: FCP tracks the amount of time taken from when a page starts to load to when the first content on that page is visible. LCP tracks the amount of time taken until a large piece of content is visible. (Only on Desktop/Firefox/Chrome/Edge)
panels.title: First Contentful Paint (FCP)/Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all First Contentful Paint measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 1.8s
- Needs Improvement: 3s
panels.title: FCP (Overall)

panels.description: A measurement of how much page layout shifts unexpectedly (Desktop/Chrome/Edge only)
panels.title: Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all Cumulative Layout Shift measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 0.1
- Needs Improvement: 0.25
panels.title: CLS (Overall)

panels.description:
The [[percentile]]th percentile of all Largest Contentful Paint measurements over the selected time period and the number of measurements taken during that time.

Target values for P75:
- Good: 2.5s
- Needs Improvement: 4s
panels.title: LCP (Overall)
